text: Anicetus Bongsu Antonius Sinaga, (25 September 1941 â€“ 7 November 2020) was the Indonesian Roman Catholic bishop of the Diocese of Sibolga and then Archbishop of the Archdiocese of Medan from 2009 to 2018. On 20 October 2020, it was reported that Sinaga had tested positive for the COVID-19 virus. Sinaga died on 7 November 2020 from the infection, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Indonesia Category:Indonesian writers Category:Indonesian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Anicetus Bongsu Antonius Sinaga
